article_title: Pospisil: Taking athletes off list not an easy thing to do
article_text:
The World-Herald’s updated Nebraska 100 will be released in a 10-part series that runs through the 26th.

The series will be published on the following dates:

Sunday: 100-91; Tuesday: 90-81; Thursday: 80-71; Saturday: 70-61; July 19: 60-51; July 21: 50-41; July 23: 40-31; July 24: 30-21; July 25: 20-11; July 26: 10-1

July 27 to Aug. 19: Fan vote. The World-Herald asks readers to pick their favorite Nebraska athlete of all-time in a seven-round vote that ends with the crowning of a fan champion.

og.description: As Sports Editor Thad Livingston writes, to add new faces to the Nebraska 100 means some on the original 2005 list had to be dropped. It was far from easy; it was more than just starting from No. 100 and working up until the subtractions equaled the additions.
